alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:36PM AKST until February 22 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, blowing snow and poor visibility expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Snow accumulation of 4 to 6 inches. Highway Summits will have winds gusting to 40 mph along with visibility one half mile or less at times. Large snow drifts will form. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Tuesday. Snow will taper off Tuesday afternoon and winds will taper off Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop tonight in all areas. Look for reduced visibilities at times. Winds gusting to 40 mph will develop tonight over highway summits causing blowing snow with low visibility. Snow will taper off Tuesday afternoon and winds over summits will taper off Tuesday evening. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
